title: RBAC UI Implementation [2.15]
description:
Figma Design

https://www.figma.com/design/s1vGXNOC4FwhGRey6wPDIw/OpenShift-Virtualization-RBAC-experience-proposal?node-id=4206-289891&t=Pm3PWQqXCnN41TYY-0

h2. *Value Statement*

RBAC UI will need to be adapted once UXD is ready
h2. *Definition of Done for Engineering Story Owner (Checklist)*
 * ...

h3. *Development Complete*
 * The code is complete.
 * Functionality is working.
 * Any required downstream Docker file changes are made.

h3. *Tests Automated*
 * [ ] Unit/function tests have been automated and incorporated into the
build.
 * [ ] 100% automated unit/function test coverage for new or changed APIs.

h3. *Secure Design*
 * [ ] Security has been assessed and incorporated into your threat model.

h3. *Multidisciplinary Teams Readiness*
 * [ ] Create an informative documentation issue using the [Customer
Portal_doc_issue template](
[https://github.com/stolostron/backlog/issues/new?assignees=&labels=squad%3Adoc&template=doc_issue.md&title=]),
and ensure doc acceptance criteria is met. Link the development issue to
the doc issue.
 * [ ] Provide input to the QE team, and ensure QE acceptance criteria
(established between story owner and QE focal) are met.

h3. *Support Readiness*
 * [ ] The must-gather script has been updated.

fields.description:
Figma Design

https://www.figma.com/design/s1vGXNOC4FwhGRey6wPDIw/OpenShift-Virtualization-RBAC-experience-proposal?node-id=4206-289891&t=Pm3PWQqXCnN41TYY-0

h2. *Value Statement*

RBAC UI will need to be adapted once UXD is ready
h2. *Definition of Done for Engineering Story Owner (Checklist)*
 * ...

h3. *Development Complete*
 * The code is complete.
 * Functionality is working.
 * Any required downstream Docker file changes are made.

h3. *Tests Automated*
 * [ ] Unit/function tests have been automated and incorporated into the
build.
 * [ ] 100% automated unit/function test coverage for new or changed APIs.

h3. *Secure Design*
 * [ ] Security has been assessed and incorporated into your threat model.

h3. *Multidisciplinary Teams Readiness*
 * [ ] Create an informative documentation issue using the [Customer
Portal_doc_issue template](
[https://github.com/stolostron/backlog/issues/new?assignees=&labels=squad%3Adoc&template=doc_issue.md&title=]),
and ensure doc acceptance criteria is met. Link the development issue to
the doc issue.
 * [ ] Provide input to the QE team, and ensure QE acceptance criteria
(established between story owner and QE focal) are met.

h3. *Support Readiness*
 * [ ] The must-gather script has been updated.
fields.summary: RBAC UI Implementation [2.15]

comments.body: Move to Train-31 sprint to to continue to work.

Hey team, added scope and areas ACM QE will be looking into [here|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mOfcHPv8thGeQwQpDg-7gbgXYG_AH8okwf6mzkWu614/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.c2z25pfyvm0b]. Please take a look when you have time and provide feedback, thanks! Fyi, [~kurwang@redhat.com] [~emingora]

Reminder: 

 

{*}Story Done Criteria (Assessed by Story Owner):{*}{*}{*}

*Dev Complete*
 * *Code Complete* - Story is fully implemented
 * *Functionality Working* - Unit and Function tested
 * Any required downstream docker file changes are done

 

*Tests Automated*
 * *Unit/Function tests* - Automated and part of the build
 * *Coverage* - 100% automation for all new/changed APIs

 

*Security*
 * Security has been assessed and incorporated into the threat model

 

*Support Readiness*
 * Must-gather script has been updated

 

*Multidisciplinary Teams*
 * Docs - Doc issue created using the documentation_report template
 * QE - Meets acceptance criteria defined between Story owner and QE
